text: Arabang P. (A.P.) Maruping (born 1944) is a Lesotho civil servant and diplomat. She served as Chairman of UNICEF at the international level from 1987 to 1988. She resigned April 1988 and was replaced by Makoto Taniguchi for the remainder of the term.Officers of the UNICEF Executive Board 1946–2014, UNICEFExecutive Board, UNICEF She was also a member of the UNICEF/WHO Joint Committee on Health Policy.Yearbook of the United Nations. 41.1987 In Lesotho she was Director of Health Services.Lesotho Clippings p. 120, 1985 She was also Regional Advisor for Child and Adolescent Health at the WHO Regional Office for Africa. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Lesotho diplomats Category:Chairmen and Presidents of UNICEF Category:Lesotho women diplomats Category:Lesotho officials of the United Nations
title: Arabang P. Maruping
